sense.name: hold back in uncertainty or unwillingness
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] HESITATE [predicate] NOTE: Use this sense only where HESITATE is followed by an infinitival verb. Observe examples below.
sense.examples: Authorities hesitate to quote exact figures. The FBI won't hesitate to act. Do you hesitate to buy what you like? Neighbors hesitated to call the police.

sense.name: interrupt temporarily an activity
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1 HESITATE (PP) NOTE: Compare to Sense 1: Sense 2 is used where HESITATE is not followed by an infinitival verb, but rather an optional PP.
sense.examples: He hesitated before giving Slavin the knock-out blow. As he pulled towards a green light, he hesitated, then decided to speed up.
